ðŸ“– Summary: DGM.js is a TypeScript library for creating an infinite canvas with smart shapes. It supports features like scripting, constraints, multi-page support, hand-drawn styles, real-time collaboration, and various export formats. It is suitable for building diagramming, drawing, and sketching applications.
